message: I'll take the lion's share, but you get a taste of the profit.  Accept this and we're both rich.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a significant share - 40% - to end this quickly. A 60/40 split ensures we both benefit greatly. Don't let greed get in the way of a good deal!
You're starting to get greedy, Bob!  I'm offering you a generous 40% share, let's call it even, and end this game.  Time is money, remember?
